Here is the list of signs and their scores on the $line:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural leadership and adventurous spirit make up for some impulsiveness.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Practicality and stability are strengths, but stubbornness can hinder progress.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Quick wit and adaptability shine, but scattered attention span holds them back.
4. Cancer - 5/10 - Emotional depth and nurturing nature are assets, but moodiness and clinginess hold them back.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Confidence and charisma are key, but arrogance and pride can be a liability.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Attention to detail and analytical mind are strengths, but perfectionism and worry can hinder.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Balance and diplomacy shine, but indecision and people-pleasing can hold them back.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate intensity and insight are key, but jealousy and secrecy can be a liability.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Optimism and adventurous spirit are assets, but tactlessness and restlessness can hinder.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Ambition and discipline are strengths, but rigidity and pessimism can hold them back.
11. Aquarius - 7/10 - Humanitarian instincts and originality shine, but detachment and rebelliousness can be a liability.
12. Pisces - 5/10 - Empathy and creativity are assets, but dreaminess and lack of boundaries can hold them back.
